title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When inserting a text, data, and dynamic text item with a content of new Date() into a table, the dynamic text item displays the datetime value in a different format compared to the data and text items.
EB: The data and text items, as well as the dynamic text item, should display the datetime value in the same format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item into a table. 
2. Set the content of all three items to new Date(). 
3. Save and preview the table. 

Expected result: All three items should show the same datetime format. 
Actual result: The data and text items display the datetime value in the expected format, but the dynamic text item shows a different format.
